name: midnight metro
description:
It's midnight and you only want to get home <3
stroll around this metro station and get a glimpse of the people sharing this space with you at this time.

_____

Credits:

raw music: Taranis by Metre
music edits + additional sounds by Kai Werder

_____

Things to keep in mind:

I had this idea for what feels like an eternity, maybe it's already 5 years. I am really relived to know I am one burden lighter. Enjoy your stay!

Inspirations from this year: coffee talk, midnight ramen, midnight dinner and a tweet about how people in subway stations look like actors
